title: Book a Shore Excursion for a Cruise
description: A passenger on an upcoming cruise wants to book a 'Dolphin Swim' shore excursion for one of their port days.

tasks.description: Retrieve the passenger's cruise booking and the list of available excursions for their itinerary.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the booking and the list of available tours.

tasks.description: Check availability for the 'Dolphin Swim' excursion on the desired port day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms there are spots available.

tasks.description: Book the excursion for the passenger and charge it to their onboard account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the tour and adds the charge to the passenger's folio.
